content.body: Yes, this is great! Next week I'll start changing Jaro's Terser and DevTools prototype to emit the proposed format to see how well this works for DevTools :)

Thank you Nic for writing up a stage process for source maps. I landed it at https://github.com/tc39/source-map-rfc/blob/main/PROCESS.md . Let's review this at the next TG4 meeting to ensure that everyone is on board, but it's basically a more concrete version of what I suggested in Munich.
content.formatted_body: Thank you Nic for writing up a stage process for source maps. I landed it at https://github.com/tc39/source-map-rfc/blob/main/PROCESS.md . Let's review this at the next TG4 meeting to ensure that everyone is on board, but it's basically a more concrete version of what I suggested in Munich.

content.body: It'd be great to hear if anyone has any further comments or concerns
